attributes.title: I’d rate it 0 stars if that was an option
attributes.review: HORRIBLE ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE. I downloaded this app and immediately it took over my phone causing it to FLY ACROSS MY ROOM HITTING MY MOTHER AND FATHER ACROSS THE HEAD. Now they’re both dead. Thank you. Thank you SO much now I have no parents.

attributes.title: Jesus save us all
attributes.review: This app is so horrible it asks for all of your information and this and that, the liberals are crazy yes I know but this app just ain’t it y’all 🤢. So sorry trump but ya need to do better to get my vote.

attributes.title: horrible.
attributes.review: I honestly downloaded this app to keep up and make sure i’m voting for the right person. but this app is filled w biased news and in entirety Donald is the most immature president i’ve ever met. bye.

attributes.title: Absolutely inappropriate
attributes.review: This app is full of false promises. It will put our country in danger. It is unhealthy for our children to see this or even come across this.

attributes.title: SCAM CALLS ALLLL THE TIME
attributes.review: They made me put in my phone number and since then, I’ve been getting calls NONSTOP. If this is how the President of the United States deals with our info on an app, imagine what he does in his administration.

attributes.title: Doesn’t even work!
attributes.review: This is a terrible app! I wanted to be able to see what was new in the world but it just kicks me out of the app! Super disappointed, Biden2020

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: this app took weeks to download and the app still doesn’t work it took up all my space and I couldn’t do anything with it this app is terrible don’t download it
